title: How to Make Quinoa Patties

steps.headline: Over a low heat, cook the chopped shallot.
steps.description: Remove from the heat and place in the mixing bowl.

steps.headline: Add the cooked quinoa and the remaining ingredients to the pan.
Mix well.
steps.description: As you're mixing, add enough flour to form a firm dough.

steps.headline: Shape little patties using your hands.
Arrange the patties in a lightly oiled frying pan and fry until a light golden brown on each side.
Keep warm in the oven.
steps.description: That way, you can serve all the patties at once.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Add some chutney or sauce, a side salad and some bread with olive oil and you're set for a delicious meal.

text: Over a low heat, cook the chopped shallot. Remove from the heat and place in the mixing bowl. Add the cooked quinoa and the remaining ingredients to the pan.  Mix well. As you're mixing, add enough flour to form a firm dough. Shape little patties using your hands.  Arrange the patties in a lightly oiled frying pan and fry until a light golden brown on each side.  Keep warm in the oven. That way, you can serve all the patties at once. Serve. Add some chutney or sauce, a side salad and some bread with olive oil and you're set for a delicious meal.
